Crashlytics
Mobius Wallet shouldn't request access to the media library. If you see this, please respond 'NO' and contact support@mobius.network
Mobius Wallet shouldn't request access to the bluetooth devices. If you see this, please respond 'NO' and contact support@mobius.network
Mobius Wallet shouldn't request access to your calendars. If you see this, please respond 'NO' and contact support@mobius.network
Mobius Wallet shouldn't request access to your contacts. If you see this, please respond 'NO' and contact support@mobius.network
